00028 #ifndef __InstanceBatch_H__
00029 #define __InstanceBatch_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreRenderOperation.h"
00033 #include "OgreRenderable.h"
00034 #include "OgreMovableObject.h"
00035 #include "OgreMesh.h"
00036 
00037 namespace Ogre
00038 {
00087     class _OgreExport InstanceBatch : public Renderable, public MovableObject
00088     {
00089     public:
00090         typedef vector<InstancedEntity*>::type InstancedEntityVec;
00091     protected:
00092         RenderOperation     mRenderOperation;
00093         size_t              mInstancesPerBatch;
00094 
00095         InstanceManager     *mCreator;
00096 
00097         MaterialPtr         mMaterial;
00098 
00099         MeshPtr              mMeshReference;
00100         Mesh::IndexMap const *mIndexToBoneMap;
00101 
00102         //InstancedEntities are all allocated at build time and kept as "unused"
00103         //when they're requested, they're removed from there when requested,
00104         //and put back again when they're no longer needed
00105         //Note each InstancedEntity has a unique ID ranging from [0; mInstancesPerBatch)
00106         InstancedEntityVec  mInstancedEntities;
00107         InstancedEntityVec  mUnusedEntities;
00108 
00109         //This bbox contains all (visible) instanced entities
00110         AxisAlignedBox      mFullBoundingBox;
00111         Real                mBoundingRadius;
00112         bool                mBoundsDirty;
00113         bool                mBoundsUpdated; //Set to false by derived classes that need it
00114         Camera              *mCurrentCamera;
00115 
00116         unsigned short      mMaterialLodIndex;
00117 
00118         bool                mDirtyAnimation; //Set to false at start of each _updateRenderQueue
00119 
00120         //False if a technique doesn't support skeletal animation
00121         bool                mTechnSupportsSkeletal;
00122 
00124         mutable Real mCachedCameraDist;
00126         mutable const Camera *mCachedCamera;
00127 
00129         bool mTransformSharingDirty;
00130 
00131         //When true remove the memory of the VertexData we've created because no one else will
00132         bool mRemoveOwnVertexData;
00133         //When true remove the memory of the IndexData we've created because no one else will
00134         bool mRemoveOwnIndexData;
00135 
00136         virtual void setupVertices( const SubMesh* baseSubMesh ) = 0;
00137         virtual void setupIndices( const SubMesh* baseSubMesh ) = 0;
00138         virtual void createAllInstancedEntities(void);
00139         virtual void deleteAllInstancedEntities(void);
00140         virtual void deleteUnusedInstancedEntities(void);
00142         virtual InstancedEntity* generateInstancedEntity(size_t num);
00143 
00148         void makeMatrixCameraRelative3x4( float *mat3x4, size_t numFloats );
00149 
00150         //Returns false on errors that would prevent building this batch from the given submesh
00151         virtual bool checkSubMeshCompatibility( const SubMesh* baseSubMesh );
00152 
00153         void updateVisibility(void);
00154 
00156         void defragmentBatchNoCull( InstancedEntityVec &usedEntities );
00157 
00163         void defragmentBatchDoCull( InstancedEntityVec &usedEntities );
00164 
00165     public:
00166         InstanceBatch( InstanceManager *creator, MeshPtr &meshReference, const MaterialPtr &material,
00167                         size_t instancesPerBatch, const Mesh::IndexMap *indexToBoneMap,
00168                         const String &batchName );
00169         virtual ~InstanceBatch();
00170 
00171         MeshPtr& _getMeshRef() { return mMeshReference; }
00172 
00175         void _setInstancesPerBatch( size_t instancesPerBatch );
00176 
00177         const Mesh::IndexMap* _getIndexToBoneMap() const { return mIndexToBoneMap; }
00178 
00185         bool _supportsSkeletalAnimation() const { return mTechnSupportsSkeletal; }
00186 
00188         void _updateBounds(void);
00189 
00200         virtual size_t calculateMaxNumInstances( const SubMesh *baseSubMesh, uint16 flags ) const = 0;
00201 
00215         virtual RenderOperation build( const SubMesh* baseSubMesh );
00216 
00229         virtual void buildFrom( const SubMesh *baseSubMesh, const RenderOperation &renderOperation );
00230 
00231         const Ogre::MeshPtr& _getMeshReference(void) const { return mMeshReference; }
00232 
00236         bool isBatchFull(void) const { return mUnusedEntities.empty(); }
00237 
00240         bool isBatchUnused(void) const { return mUnusedEntities.size() == mInstancedEntities.size(); }
00241 
00245         void getInstancedEntitiesInUse( InstancedEntityVec &outEntities );
00246 
00258         void _defragmentBatch( bool optimizeCulling, InstancedEntityVec &usedEntities );
00259 
00265         void _defragmentBatchDiscard(void);
00266 
00270         virtual void _boundsDirty(void);
00271 
00285         virtual void setStaticAndUpdate( bool bStatic )     {}
00286 
00289         virtual bool isStatic() const                       { return false; }
00290 
00297         InstancedEntity* createInstancedEntity();
00298 
00305         void removeInstancedEntity( InstancedEntity *instancedEntity );
00306 
00310         virtual bool useBoneWorldMatrices() const { return true; }
00311 
00313         void _markTransformSharingDirty() { mTransformSharingDirty = true; }
00314 
00315         //Renderable overloads
00316         const MaterialPtr& getMaterial(void) const      { return mMaterial; }
00317         void getRenderOperation( RenderOperation& op )  { op = mRenderOperation; }
00318 
00319         Real getSquaredViewDepth( const Camera* cam ) const;
00320         const LightList& getLights( void ) const;
00321         Technique* getTechnique(void) const;
00322 
00323         //MovableObject overloads
00324         const String& getMovableType(void) const;
00325         void _notifyCurrentCamera( Camera* cam );
00326         const AxisAlignedBox& getBoundingBox(void) const;
00327         Real getBoundingRadius(void) const;
00328 
00329         virtual void _updateRenderQueue(RenderQueue* queue);
00330         void visitRenderables( Renderable::Visitor* visitor, bool debugRenderables = false );
00331     };
00332 }
